name: Poker Boss: Texas Holdem
description:
Poker Boss is a quality and reputable online game portal.

Poker Boss: Texas Holdem Offline play when offline or online. Blackjack is one of the most popular casino games in the world. With beautiful and intuitive design.


Game features
==> MINI GAMES (poker, blackjack) - Enjoy mini games while you are in the app
==> NICE INTERFACE - Satisfy both professional and amateur players!
==> FUNCTIONALITY - Slip function, lucky spinning disc etc .. Experience all kinds of online casino games, extremely fun!
==> SUPPORT VARIABLES OF THE SCREEN - Mobile, comfortable and easy to change equipment!
==> Great Poker Game!

Download Poker Boss: Texas Holdem Offline and start playing today!
